title: A review of modified and hybrid anaerobic baffled reactors for municipal wastewater treatment with a focus on emerging contaminants
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00822C, Critical Review
Poh Lin Lau, Antoine P. Trzcinski
This review discusses municipal wastewater treatment using anaerobic baffled reactors (ABRs) and modified ABRs to remove C, N, P and emerging contaminants.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
